title: "UAE: Robots to help you get driving licence, vehicle registration"
excerpt: "Two robots that will assist and guide residents looking to get vehicle or driver licensing services have been introduced in the UAE. The robots have been deployed at the Vehicles and Drivers Licensing Services Centre in Ajman."
